variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 10% on the portion of income from $0 up to $23,200. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 12% on the portion of income from $23,201 up to $94,300. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 22% on the portion of income from $94,301 up to $201,050. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 24% on the portion of income from $201,051 up to $383,900. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_5
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 5: 32% on the portion of income from $383,901 up to $487,450. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_6
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 6: 35% on the portion of income from $487,451 up to $731,200. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_7
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 7: 37% on the portion of income from $731,201 and above. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_7 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all seven brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
